comment.body: I don't know if you're male or female lol
@Nekololi: oh, oops I read your reply wrong, I thought it said you were interested in men

@西木野真姬: if you click the image to zoom in, you'll then be able to right click and save as
I did a quick inspection on the code, and it looks like they've tagged it as a background image to get some neat css functions that won't work otherwise

if you want to post to both simultaneously someone made a python script for that!
I haven't tested it myself though so please do tell me of your experience if you try.
and for viewing both at once, you *can* use vivaldi (browser) for that, although the experience of that is so-so.
here's the python script before I forget
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:4_1AWwhg4EiWAVttfQboJZ4wJfX3WawfJT3h

@Zeronet0: zeronet should work over anything that supports the ip protocol, bluetooth can be used in such a way if you enable internet sharing over bluetooth.
and wifi-direct should just work, I can't say I've looked into that in particular but from what I know of it, it should be fine.
